about_the_game:
This is a Word Adventure Game where the player plays a poor college student-Xiaoxi. In order to make money, you applied for a job in a mysterious laboratory. Although the director of the laboratory has repeatedly assured that this is a very "safe organization", as the incident progresses, you know very well that this mysterious laboratory seems to be hidden .... "something"



✔ In the days of the lab, you and these "strange" colleagues participated in many happy/interesting times together
✔ Collect CG and collect story information, perhaps more "deep" clues, hidden in these plot dialogues



✔ The money for part-time work is far from enough to live. You have to explore a huge ruin for the laboratory and search for the ruins inside.
✔ Remember any clues that may appear, and use your wisdom to solve abstract text puzzles in the ruins!



✔ Until one day, you met Experiment No. R008, a child named "Xiao Qi".
✔ The calm daily life seems to be broken by some mysterious force...

An irreversible cycle of fate will become a huge ░deep ░░░ deep ░░░ deep, let ░someone░░░░ go in░░
░Danger░░░Danger░░░░░ Police░░░Notice░░░░░
detailed_description:
This is a Word Adventure Game where the player plays a poor college student-Xiaoxi. In order to make money, you applied for a job in a mysterious laboratory. Although the director of the laboratory has repeatedly assured that this is a very "safe organization", as the incident progresses, you know very well that this mysterious laboratory seems to be hidden .... "something"



✔ In the days of the lab, you and these "strange" colleagues participated in many happy/interesting times together
✔ Collect CG and collect story information, perhaps more "deep" clues, hidden in these plot dialogues



✔ The money for part-time work is far from enough to live. You have to explore a huge ruin for the laboratory and search for the ruins inside.
✔ Remember any clues that may appear, and use your wisdom to solve abstract text puzzles in the ruins!



✔ Until one day, you met Experiment No. R008, a child named "Xiao Qi".
✔ The calm daily life seems to be broken by some mysterious force...

name: 我滿懷歧異的意識代碼

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 700 Series
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: I managed to get the opportunity to work in the laboratory! Although I have to be locked in the laboratory for a month, my colleagues are very easy to get along with. Although the children in the laboratory are a bit dull, they are very cute! I believe that everything is not There will be a problem!
